title: Over Mountains Through Deserts: A 1982 Bicycle Tour on Kodachrome Slide Film
content: This video documents a couple on a road tour through southwest Colorado and southern Utah in 1982. That’s prior to the internet, mobile phones, and GoPro.Â  All images within were captured on Kodachrome slide film and were just recently scanned and uploaded to YouTube. Videos like this have all the bicycle touring vibes!
author: prolly
